data: In the matter of raising canary-birds—at once strong of body and of note, tamed to associate with humanity on rarely friendly terms, and taught to sing with a sweetness nothing short of heavenly—Andreas Stoffel was second to none.

In the matter of raising canary-birds--at once strong of body and of note, tamed to associate with humanity on rarely friendly terms, and taught to sing with a sweetness nothing short of heavenly--Andreas Stoffel was second to none.

An Idyl of the East Side
1891
Janvier, Thomas A. (Thomas Allibone), 1849-1913; Smedley, W. T. (William Thomas), 1858-1920 [Illustrator]
